Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapPolyline

  • Packages that use MapPolyline 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.customlocation
    This package provides classes and interfaces that support custom location searches.
    com.here.android.mpa.customlocation2
    This package provides classes and interfaces that support the more advanced version of custom location search.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping
    The mapping package provides classes, interfaces, and enumerations that display an interactive map, and related functionality that allows your application to create and add map content.

    • Uses of MapPolyline in com.here.android.mpa.customlocation

      MapPolyline Result.LineStringGeometry.createMapPolyline()
      Helper method that creates MapPolyline based on this geometry.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<MapPolyline> Result.MultiLineStringGeometry.createMapPolylines()
      Helper method that creates list of MapPolyline based on the geometry.

    • Uses of MapPolyline in com.here.android.mpa.mapping

      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.mapping that return MapPolyline 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MapPolyline MapPolyline.setCapStyle(MapPolyline.CapStyle style)
      Set the MapPolyline rendering cap style.
      MapPolyline MapPolyline.setDashEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Sets the appearance of this MapPolyline as either a dashed or solid line.
      MapPolyline MapPolyline.setDashPrimaryLength(int length)
      Sets a length, in pixels, for the primary dash segment of a dashed MapPolyline.
      MapPolyline MapPolyline.setDashSecondaryLength(int length)
      Sets a length, in pixels, for the secondary (empty) dash segments of a dashed MapPolyline.
      MapPolyline MapPolyline.setGeodesicEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Set whether to draw each segment of the represented GeoPolyline as a geodesic.
      MapPolyline MapPolyline.setGeoPolyline(GeoPolyline polyline)
      Changes the GeoPolyline rendered by this GeoPolyline
      MapPolyline MapPolyline.setLineColor(int color)
      Sets a line color for this MapPolyline, using an ARGB (Alpha/Red/Green/Blue) integer color value.
      MapPolyline MapPolyline.setLineWidth(int width)
      Sets a line width, in pixels, for this MapPolyline, an int value within the [0..100] range.
